scopecontent.p: This series includes records and briefs for cases heard by the Supreme Court of Virginia. These records were filed with the Clerk of the Supreme Court and copies forwarded to each justice for review and study before the cases were argued. Types of records may include brief of appellant, brief of appellee, reply briefs, reply briefs cross appellant, amicus briefs, petitions, and appendices.
Accession 35776 is bound briefs and appendices, covering 1870 through 1968. All other accessions are loose briefs and appendices.
